languages.text: {n}Пол клетки завален трупами — мертвые руки свисают меж прутьев, бледные лица прижаты к холодному металлу. Над ними возвышается Кибелла, замершая между двух женских фигур. Она внимает их зловещему шепоту, руки ее безвольно опущены.{/n}

{n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пол клетки завален трупами — мертвые руки свисают меж прутьев, бледные лица прижаты к холодному металлу. Над ними возвышается Кибелла, замершая между двух женских фигур. Она внимает их зловещему шепоту, руки ее безвольно опущены.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their dead hands sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her hands hanging limply.{/n}

{n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their dead hands sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her hands hanging limply.{/n}

{n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}

{n}Three Kibellahs stand before you, surrounded by the corpses of their exact copies, their dead hands sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the metal cage. The standing figures address you in a discordant quarrel of intermixing whispers:{/n} "Enim'{name}, you are alive... But is that really you? Don't look at us!" {n}The figures stand up to their ankles in congealed blood that has pooled at the bottom of the cage.{/n}

{n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}

{n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}

{n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El suelo de la jaula está lleno de cadáveres cuyos brazos se escapan entre los barrotes y cuyos rostros pálidos están apretados contra el frío metal. Entre ellos se alza Kibellah, inmóvil entre dos mujeres. Escucha sus siniestros susurros con los brazos inertes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El suelo de la jaula está lleno de cadáveres cuyos brazos se escapan entre los barrotes y cuyos rostros pálidos están apretados contra el frío metal. Entre ellos se alza Kibellah, inmóvil entre dos mujeres. Escucha sus siniestros susurros con los brazos inertes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}檻の床には死体が散乱している。その腕は鉄格子の隙間から突き出されており、青白い顔を金属製の檻に押し付けられている。その上に、2つの女性の人型の間で固まったように立ち尽くすキベラがいる。その不吉な囁きに耳を傾ける彼女の腕は、力なく揺れている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}檻の床には死体が散乱している。その腕は鉄格子の隙間から突き出されており、青白い顔を金属製の檻に押し付けられている。その上に、2つの女性の人型の間で固まったように立ち尽くすキベラがいる。その不吉な囁きに耳を傾ける彼女の腕は、力なく揺れている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}囚笼的地板上躺着无数尸体，尸体的手从栅栏之间伸出来，苍白的面孔紧贴在金属笼子上。绮贝菈站在尸体之中，一动不动，身边站着另外两个女性。她静静地聆听着那两个人邪恶的低语，双臂无力地垂在身边。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚笼的地板上躺着无数尸体，尸体的手从栅栏之间伸出来，苍白的面孔紧贴在金属笼子上。绮贝菈站在尸体之中，一动不动，身边站着另外两个女性。她静静地聆听着那两个人邪恶的低语，双臂无力地垂在身边。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Boden des Käfigs ist mit Leichen übersät, die mit den Armen durch die Gitterstäbe greifen und mit ihren fahlen Gesichtern auf dem kalten Metall ruhen. Über ihnen steht Kibellah zwischen zwei weiblichen Gestalten. Sie lauscht ihrem unheilvollen Flüstern und lässt kraftlos die Arme hängen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Boden des Käfigs ist mit Leichen übersät, die mit den Armen durch die Gitterstäbe greifen und mit ihren fahlen Gesichtern auf dem kalten Metall ruhen. Über ihnen steht Kibellah zwischen zwei weiblichen Gestalten. Sie lauscht ihrem unheilvollen Flüstern und lässt kraftlos die Arme hängen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le sol de la cage est jonché de cadavres ; leurs bras dépassent des barreaux et leurs visages exsangues se pressent contre le métal froid. Au beau milieu de ce charnier, Kibellah se tient immobile entre deux silhouettes féminines. Les bras ballants, elle écoute leurs murmures sinistres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sol de la cage est jonché de cadavres ; leurs bras dépassent des barreaux et leurs visages exsangues se pressent contre le métal froid. Au beau milieu de ce charnier, Kibellah se tient immobile entre deux silhouettes féminines. Les bras ballants, elle écoute leurs murmures sinistres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kafesin zemini cesetlerle dolu. Kolları parmaklıkların arasından uzanmış ve solgun yüzleri soğuk metale yaslanmış. Kibellah; onların üzerinde, iki kadın suretinin arasında, donmuş hâlde duruyor ve kollarını yanlara salmış şekilde o ikisinin meşum fısıltılarını dinliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The floor of the cage is littered with corpses, their arms sticking out between the bars and their pale faces pressed against the cold metal. Above them stands Kibellah, frozen between two female figures. She listens to their sinister whispers, her arms hanging limply.{/n}
